product_name: Smith Knowledge Turbo OTG Fan Goggles - Men's
long_description: Smith Knowledge Turbo OTG Fan Goggles accommodate a wide range of eyeglasses and fight fog with patented Turbo Fan technology, Porex filter, 5X antifog inner lens and large interior volume.
short_description: Smith Knowledge Turbo OTG Fan Goggles accommodate a wide range of eyeglasses and fight fog with patented Turbo Fan technology, Porex filter, 5X antifog inner lens and large interior volume.
